name: Finding Fern
description:
A Witches Tale Take a journey with Fern and Momo across a world of mystery, and intrigue. As she searches for her mother. Meet helpful strangers and interesting people, defeat powerful enemies, and obtain great magic, as you explore a vast, rich, fantasy world! Play as multiple party members and switch between them on the fly! Meet new people who will join your group, and pick what play style fits you! Finding Fern is an Action Adventure RPG with an emphasis on story and dialog. Your party members will talk to each other as well as many people and denizens they meet along the way. What are you waiting for? The last blue melon to fall from the bush?

KEY FEATURES

  • Party system (Play as multiple characters, switch between them on the fly, and even play as 2 different parties)
  • Tarot System (obtain tarot readings that can benefit or hurt your group)
  • Brewing (A crafting system to create potions and foods)
  • Encounters (When traveling across the world map, you'll have a chance to run into random encounters)
  • LOOT (Yes plenty of loot from Rat Tails to Mysterious Artifacts, to unique pieces of equipment)
  • Endless Upgrade System (Upgrade via points you obtain from doing various actions)
  • Atmospheric (every area has it's own atmosphere, music, and general feeling to it)
  • Lighting (Lighting plays a role in the games mechanics)
  • Ability System (Each character has unique abilities, they can obtain new abilities and upgrade them, but you can only have 2 assigned per character at once)
  • Cute Gibberish Voices (Every character in the world talks with a cute gibberish dialect)
  • A Rich... yet simple story.
PLAY THE DEMO TODAY!
